precondition: The Control Panel window is open and displaying the default category view with the navigation pane visible on the left side.
action: Click on the "Switch to Classic View" option located in the navigation pane of the Control Panel window.
expected_results: The Control Panel will switch to the classic view, displaying all control panel options as individual icons in a list.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" dialog box is open.
action: Click the dropdown menu labeled "Turn off hard disks:" and select the desired time interval.
expected_results: The selected time interval will be displayed in the "Turn off hard disks:" dropdown menu.

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open and the "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is selected within the "Power Schemes" tab.
action: Click and hold the dropdown menu associated with the "System hibernates:" setting.
expected_results: A dropdown menu will appear, displaying a list of time intervals and the option "Never".

precondition: The "Power Options Properties" window is open with the "Power Schemes" tab selected. The "Home/Office Desk" power scheme is selected. The desired time intervals for power-saving options are selected in the dropdowns.
expected_results: The "Power Options Properties" window will close. The selected power scheme and its settings will be saved.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is open and displaying items in the classic icon view.
action: Click and hold the left mouse button on the 'Power Options' icon.
expected_results: The 'Power Options' icon will be highlighted in a lighter blue color.

precondition: The Windows XP Control Panel is open, displaying the classic icon view.
action: Click the "Display" icon, represented by a stylized computer monitor.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will open, with the "Themes" tab selected by default.

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Themes", "Desktop", "Screen Saver", "Appearance" and "Settings" tabs are visible.
expected_results: The content area of the "Display Properties" window will change to display options related to the visual appearance of Windows XP, such as window colors, fonts, and visual effects.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab in the "Display Properties" window is open.
action: Click on the dropdown menu labeled "Screen saver".
expected_results: A list of available screensaver options will appear, including "None".

precondition: The "Display Properties" window is open and the "Screen Saver" tab is selected. The "Screen Saver" dropdown menu should be visible.
action: Click on the "Screen Saver" dropdown menu to expand it and view the available screensaver options.
expected_results: A list of available screensaver options, including "None", "Windows XP", "3D FlowerBox", and others, will be displayed. One of the options may be highlighted, indicating the current selection.

precondition: The "Screen Saver" tab within the "Display Properties" window is open.
action: Click the "OK" button at the bottom of the window.
expected_results: The "Display Properties" window will close. You will be returned to the previous window, likely the Control Panel.

precondition: The 'Control Panel' window is open and displaying items in the 'Classic View'. The 'Display' icon, represented by a computer monitor, is visible.
